Well I don't know much about anything, but I sure liked this film. In short, it was creative, humorous, simple, and heartwarming.
I could tell that the people working behind-the-scenes really cared about their film. They may not be professionals by trade or degree (possibly possible), but they went above and beyond to make a wonderful short film.
The story is told excellently through dialogue and action. The comedic timing of Elias Malou is top notch
